title: Beneath the Performance

panel_structure.description: Layers of social media profiles peeling away like onion skins—LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter personas dissolving to reveal emptiness beneath
In the empty space, a faint humming vibration visible—the primal question pulsing where all performances end

transformation_notes: The scene strips away digital-age performances to reveal the existential hum that persists when all social fictions dissolve—preparing for the primal question.
